name: ETFEP
description:
Entry for the gogodotjam . 

Yeah I couldn't come up with a better name. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Basically you play as a fly and should escape this massive carnivorous plant. 

There's not much into it.

[Right after exporting the game I realized that I  did a terrible job explaining how the game works to the player in the game so imma do it here]

There are some poison pieces which randomly fall from the sky, you have to avoid colliding with them . Also you'll get an extra point if you make the plant eat them instead . 

There are also this anvil things. First you see them in a magic bulb kinda thing. You have to activate them in order to spawn an anvil in that lane. Shortly after an anvil will fall and if you manage to make the plant get hit by it, you'll get 10 extra points also the plant will slow down for a little while. 

DEV highscore : 749

The `hard` difficulty gets activated after the 1000 mark which so far no one has managed to reach yet. 

---

everything here is done by me except some of the sound effects I downloaded from freesound.org and manipulated in audacity . (lol the roaring bits are done by me)

I would share the game project if the code didn't suck, but unfortunately it does
